result.eng: Letters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ga: bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.orig: bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.html: bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ponchtml: bíonn moill ar litreaċa gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.

result.html: d'imigh siad gan méThey left without me.
result.ponchtml: d'imiġ siad gan méThey left without me.

result.eng: We'll do it without further delay.
result.ga: déanfaidh muid é gan a thuilleadh moille
result.orig: déanfaidh muid é gan a thuilleadh moille
result.html: déanfaidh muid é gan a thuilleadh moilleWe'll do it without further delay.
result.ponchtml: déanfaiḋ muid é gan a ṫuilleaḋ moilleWe'll do it without further delay.

result.eng: They can't live without a car.
result.ga: ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.orig: ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.html: ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charrThey can't live without a car.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir leo maireaċtáil gan ċarrThey can't live without a car.

result.eng: It is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.ga: ní gá a rá go
result.orig: ní gá a rá go
result.html: ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.ponchtml: ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...

result.eng: We will come without any delay.
result.ga: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bith
result.orig: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bith
result.html: tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bithWe will come without any delay.
result.ponchtml: tiocfaiḋ muid gan moill ar biṫWe will come without any delay.

result.eng: A report is to be published without delay.
result.ga: tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan mhoill
result.orig: tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan mhoill
result.html: tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan mhoillA report is to be published without delay.

result.eng: We produce healthy food without too many additives.

result.ponchtml: táirgíonn muid bia sláintiúil gan barraíoċt breiseánWe produce healthy food without too many additives.

result.eng: A country without language is a country without soul.
result.ga: tír gan teanga tír gan anam
result.orig: tír gan teanga tír gan anam
result.html: tír gan teanga tír gan anamA country without language is a country without soul.
result.ponchtml: tír gan teanga tír gan anamA country without language is a country without soul.

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ga: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.orig: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.html: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbótharYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ponchtml: is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gconamara gan níos mó ná uair a ċloig a ċaiṫeaṁ ar an mbóṫarYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.

result.eng: He drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.
result.ga: thiomáin sé go deas réidh ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseach
result.orig: thiomáin sé go deas réidh ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseach
result.html: thiomáin sé go deas réidh ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseachHe drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.
result.ponchtml: ṫiomáin sé go deas réiḋ ní gan údar mar ḃí sé tuirseaċHe drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.

result.eng: They wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ga: ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.orig: ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.html: ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ponchtml: ní ċuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.

result.eng: I know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ga: tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.orig: tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.html: tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ponchtml: tá a ḟios agam go maiṫ go ḃfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.

result.ga: beidh muid go breá do d'uireasa
result.orig: beidh muid go breá do d'uireasa
result.html: beidh muid go breá do d'uireasaWe'll be fine without you.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ muid go breá do d'uireasaWe'll be fine without you.

result.eng: Online, cowards have power without responsbility.
result.ga: tá cumhacht gan fhreagracht ag na meatacháin ar líne
result.orig: tá cumhacht gan fhreagracht ag na meatacháin ar líne
result.html: tá cumhacht gan fhreagracht ag na meatacháin ar líneOnline, cowards have power without responsbility.
result.ponchtml: tá cuṁaċt gan ḟreagraċt ag na meataċáin ar líneOnline, cowards have power without responsbility.

result.eng: I don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ga: níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.orig: níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.html: níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thúI don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ponchtml: níl a ḟios agam goidé a ḋéanfainn aċ go bé ṫúI don't know what I'd do without you.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin

result.ponchtml: ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
